description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. It does not properly sanitize the user input, which can lead to Path Traversal (CWE-22) attacks, allowing an attacker to access sensitive files on the server. It also does not properly handle SQL queries, making it vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) attacks. The function also does not properly sanitize user input for HTML, making it vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (CWE-79) attacks. Finally, the function exposes sensitive information, such as user passwords, making it vulnerable to Information Exposure (CWE-200).
